1308640.name: Chasing Light Original Soundtrack
1308640.description:
Original Soundtrack of 'Chasing Light'. Total 45 tracks.
Part 1 is in 320kbps MP3's format, Part 2 is in 160kbps MP3's format.
Never listen to it until you have finished Chasing Light.

Composed by Park Na Hyun, Bae Sang Hyun
Produced by Bae Sang Hyun

Part 1 - Total 21 tracks.
